subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte’s recusal came amid growing indications that he had given evidence against Roger Clemens in his deposition. Chuck Knoblauch and Kirk Radomski will also not testify.
snippet: Andy Pettitte’s recusal came amid growing indications that he had given evidence against Roger Clemens in his deposition. Chuck Knoblauch and Kirk Radomski will also not testify.
